text: Fotbal Club Sheriff Tiraspol, commonly known as Sheriff Tiraspol or simply Sheriff, is a professional football club based in Tiraspol, a city in the unrecognised breakaway state of Transnistria. They currently play in the Super Liga, the top tier of Moldovan football. The club was originally founded as Tiras Tiraspol in 1997, and rebranded to Sheriff Tiraspol the next year. They have won 21 Moldovan National Division titles, 12 Moldovan Cups, and seven Super Cups, more than any other club. ==Current squad== ===Out on loan=== ==Honours== FC Sheriff Tiraspol honours Type Competition Titles Seasons Domestic Super Liga 21 2000–01, 2001–02, 2002–03, 2003–04, 2004–05, 2005–06, 2006–07, 2007–08, 2008–09, 2009–10, 2011–12, 2012–13, 2013–14, 2015–16, 2016–17, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020–21, 2021–22, 2022–23 "A" Division 1 1997–98 Moldovan Cup 12 1998–99, 2000–01, 2001–02, 2005–06, 2007–08, 2008–09, 2009–10, 2014–15, 2016–17, 2018–19, 2021–22, 2022–23 Moldovan Super Cup 7 2003, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2013, 2015, 2016 International CIS Cup 2 2003, 2009 ===European record=== Competition Played Won Drew Lost GF GA GD Win% Legend: GF = Goals For.
